SEARCH
Package com.csse3200.game.components.minigames.pool.physics

Class TableConfig.Builder

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.components.minigames.pool.physics.TableConfig.Builder
Enclosing class:
TableConfig
public static class TableConfig.Builder extends Object
Fluent builder for constructing immutable TableConfig instances.

All units are expressed in world coordinates.
